TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PropertyLockMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the mode for accessing shared properties in the shared property group manager.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode Method = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Locks all the properties in the shared property group for exclusive use by the caller, as long as the caller's current method is executing.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!CAUTION] > Do not use Method when creating a property group in a constructor because this can cause a deadlock.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyLockMode SetGet = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Locks a property during a get or set, assuring that every get or set operation on a shared property is atomic.
